name: Grandmother's House
description:
Grandmother's House

Shuffle the world around you (as in classic tile puzzles) and platform your way to grandmother's house. Grandmother wants to make an apple pie, so you'd best collect all the apples before returning home.

Controls:
  • Mouse - Drag tiles to and from the 3 slots
  • Arrow keys - Move
  • Space - Jump

Use fullscreen if the game area is being clipped.

Credits:

Created for Global Game Jam 2019 ("What home means to you") by the following folks:

  • Emily Thomforde - Programming
  • Alex Benton - Art/Animation
  • Daniel Sabsay - Music/SFX/Programming
